data.title: Last Book In The Universe: W R Philbrick: Hardcover: 9780439087582: Powell's Books
data.text:
gbogus , October 19, 2006 (view all comments by gbogus)

?Then you must remember the past because it brings you to here right now, today, this moment and from here you can look to the future,? Ryter says to Spaz as he wants to forget about everything. In this book Spaz a teenage boy was sent to live on his own after getting kicked out of his latch. When he hers that his foster sister is very sick he decides that he has to go and see her. On his journey Spaz meets the old geezer Ryter who is always talking about hi9s book the last book in the universe. Spaz meets a proove who takes him into the land eof eden where the sky is blue an the grass is green. He his also always talking about before the Big Shake (a big earth quake that destroyer every thing on earth). How far is he willing to go to save his sister? Is he risking life in jail or even death? This is a very good book. In this book it shows how far a boy is willing to go to save his sisters life. If you like books that take place in the future this is the book for you. So read, read, read, and read.
